original_title: Dr. Sally Ride: A Woman Space Pioneer
overview: Ride became the first American woman to fly in space. Her accomplishments came to symbolize women's achievements in an all male-dominated fields and overnight she became one of the most famous women in American History. The film is the story of Sally Ride a woman space

title: Dr. Sally Ride: A Woman Space Pioneer
